message.wildernessodysseyapi.cryo_tube_l: The cryo tube can no longer be used.

screen.wildernessodyssey.hardware.title: Hardware Requirements
screen.wildernessodyssey.hardware.requir: • Requires at least %s of system RAM
• Requires at least %s of video RAM
hardware.wildernessodyssey.status.exceed: Your system exceeds the %s requirements (qualifies for %s).
hardware.wildernessodyssey.status.partia: Unable to fully verify the %s requirements (%s).
hardware.wildernessodyssey.status.warnin: Your system does not meet the %s requirements (%s).
screen.wildernessodyssey.hardware.best_t: Unable to determine your tier; see detailed checks below.
command.wildernessodyssey.autoshader.suc: Enabled Iris shaders using %s for the %s tier.
command.wildernessodyssey.autoshader.no_: Unable to determine a compatible hardware tier; Iris shaders were not changed.
No shader recommendation is configured for the %s tier.
command.wildernessodyssey.autoshader.pac: Recommended shader pack '%s' is not installed; saved preference anyway.
screen.wildernessodysseyapi.world_versio: Your world is outdated and needs updating.
Only operators can update the world version.
Run /updateworldversion in chat if you are an operator.
World generation and structures may change.
For bugs, test in a fresh world before reporting.
screen.wildernessodysseyapi.telemetry.de: Telemetry is enabled by default to help improve the mod. Toggle it off if you'd like to opt out.
command.wildernessodysseyapi.telemetry.s: Telemetry consent is currently set to: %s
Telemetry queue stats: pending=%s, failed=%s, last_success=%s
command.wildernessodysseyapi.feedback.pl: Only players can use this command.
command.wildernessodysseyapi.feedback.di: Feedback submissions are disabled on this server.
command.wildernessodysseyapi.feedback.no: Feedback webhook is not configured. Contact an admin.
command.wildernessodysseyapi.feedback.to: Feedback message is too long. Max length: %s characters.
